css.editor: .snow-mint{color:#fff}.snow-mint #titlearea{border-bottom:1px solid #999}.snow-mint a{color:#fff}.snow-mint table tr:nth-child(even){background-color:#444}.snow-mint table th{background:#ddd;color:#59555b}.snow-mint table td,.snow-mint table th{border-color:#999}.snow-mint blockquote{color:#fff}.snow-mint hr{background-color:#777}.snow-mint code{background-color:rgba(255,255,255,.1)}.snow-mint svg{background-color:#ccc}.snow-mint .text-cell [style]{color:#ccc!important;background-color:transparent!important}.snow-mint .diagram-cell .ace_editor,.snow-mint .latex-cell .ace_editor,.snow-mint .markdown-cell .ace_editor{color:#dfdfdf;background-color:#59555b;border:1px solid #666}.snow-mint .markdown-cell .ace_heading.ace_1,.snow-mint .markdown-cell .ace_heading.ace_1~.ace_heading{color:#00ffbf}.snow-mint .markdown-cell .ace_heading.ace_2,.snow-mint .markdown-cell .ace_heading.ace_2~.ace_heading{color:#00ffbf}.snow-mint .markdown-cell .ace_heading.ace_3,.snow-mint .markdown-cell .ace_heading.ace_3~.ace_heading{color:#00ffbf}.snow-mint .markdown-cell .ace_heading.ace_5~.ace_heading{color:#00ffbf}.snow-mint .markdown-cell .ace_heading.ace_6,.snow-mint .markdown-cell .ace_heading.ace_6~.ace_heading{color:#00ffbf}.snow-mint .markdown-cell .ace_support.ace_function{color:#44ffff}.snow-mint .markdown-cell .ace_list{color:#fff0b0}.snow-mint .markdown-cell .ace_blockquote{color:#80cbc4}.snow-mint .markdown-cell .ace_emphasis{color:#ff80ab}.snow-mint .markdown-cell .ace_strong{color:#ffcc77;font-weight:700}.snow-mint .markdown-cell .ace_markup{color:#00ffbf!important}.snow-mint .markdown-cell .ace_markup.ace_underline{color:#ccaaff!important}.snow-mint .latex-cell .ace_variable.ace_parameter{color:#fefb74}.snow-mint .latex-cell .ace_storage.ace_type{color:#00ffbf}.snow-mint .latex-cell .ace_string{color:#00e0ff}.snow-mint .latex-cell .ace_constant.ace_character.ace_escape{color:#ff80ab}.snow-mint .diagram-cell .ace_constant.ace_language.ace_escape{color:#ff80ab}.snow-mint .diagram-cell .ace_string,.snow-mint .diagram-cell .ace_underline{color:#ccaaff}.snow-mint .diagram-cell .ace_keyword{color:#80cbc4}.snow-mint  .diagram-cell .ace_macro{color:#fefb74;font-weight:700}.snow-mint .cell.inEditMode{border-color:#ff3392;}
css.preview: .snow-mint{color:#fff}.snow-mint a{color:#57eeff}.snow-mint table tr:nth-child(even){background-color:#444}.snow-mint table th{background:#ddd;color:#59555b}.snow-mint table td,.snow-mint table th{border-color:#999}.snow-mint blockquote{color:#fff}.snow-mint hr{background-color:#777}.snow-mint code{background-color:rgba(255,255,255,.2)}.snow-mint svg{background-color:#ccc}.snow-mint .text-cell [style]{color:#c7c7c7!important;background-color:transparent!important}.snow-mint #tag-field{margin:8px 2px;}.snow-mint #tag-field .tag{background:#38a2ad;border-radius:2px;color:#fff;}
css.presentation: .snow-mint{color:#fff}.snow-mint a{color:#57eeff}.snow-mint table tr:nth-child(even){background-color:#444}.snow-mint table th{background:#ddd;color:#59555b}.snow-mint table td,.snow-mint table th{border-color:#999}.snow-mint blockquote{color:#fff}.snow-mint hr{background-color:#777}.snow-mint code{background-color:rgba(255,255,255,.2)}.snow-mint svg{background-color:#ccc}.snow-mint .text-cell [style]{color:#c7c7c7!important;background-color:transparent!important}.snow-mint
